data.description: Examination of the social and historical roots of health disparities, including histories, practices, and current methodologies informing contemporary health disparities research. Participate in or explore content such as reviewing case studies pertaining to landmark research with priority populations identified by the National Institutes of Health (NIH); engage with leading scholars from across the School of Medicine and Public Health; grant proposal writing, presentation of student-led research; prepare drafts of NIH Aims page.
data.title: HEALTH DISPARITIES RESEARCH: HISTORIES, PRACTICES, AND METHODS
